mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rating_by_version(rating_one, rating_two, rating_three, rating_four, rating_five, app_name, app_version, average_rating) VALUES (#{ratingOne}, #{ratingTwo}, #{ratingThree}, #{ratingFour}, #{ratingFive}, #{appName}, #{appVersion}, #{averageRating}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rating_one=#{ratingOne}, rating_two=#{ratingTwo}, rating_three=#{ratingThree}, rating_four=#{ratingFour}, rating_five=#{ratingFive}, average_rating=#{averageRating}
mapper.select: SELECT rating_one, rating_two, rating_three, rating_four, rating_five, app_name, app_version, average_rating FROM rating_by_version WHERE app_name = #{appName} ORDER BY app_version DESC LIMIT 5
